resources.string: Ingeniero/desarrollador de software profesional con excelentes habilidades de comunicación, analítico y orientado a los detalles. Experto en reunir a todo el equipo para realizar una tarea a tiempo y con un presupuesto limitado. Dedicado a proporcionar a los clientes soluciones de software prácticas y fáciles de usar

I am confident that I would be a great fit for this role due to my 3+ years of experience in the field of android engineering and my eagerness to help the development your company. I have a proven and successful track record during my time at Amalitech company. I worked with teams and provided end-to-end solutions for clients. I also Lead developers to develop key projects for major clients(market place and aegis rider and autopart e-commerce app) In my resume, you can find more information on the skills and qualifications I would bring to the table, such as: Kotlin/Java Android Studio Fluent in kotlin coroutines Proficient in MVVM architecture Google material design component(MDC) Dependency Injection with Hilt Jetpack Compose libraries Room database/ Datastore Retrofit SDK Git
